verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to them that are at <S%H7600>ease<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, which are <S%H5344>named<s%> <S%H7225>chief<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, to whom the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>! are at: or, are secure chief: or, firstfruits

<S%H5674>Pass<s%> ye unto <S%H3641>Calneh<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%>; and from thence <S%H3212>go<s%> ye to <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2579><s%>: then go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: be they <S%H2896>better<s%> than these <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>? or their <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H7227>greater<s%> than your <S%H1366>border<s%>?
Ye that put far <S%H5077>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and cause the <S%H7675>seat<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%> to come <S%H5066>near<s%>; seat: or, habitation

That <S%H7901>lie<s%> upon <S%H4296>beds<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory<s%>, and <S%H5628>stretch<s%> themselves upon their <S%H6210>couches<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3733>lambs<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, and the <S%H5695>calves<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4770>stall<s%>; stretch: or, abound with superfluities

That <S%H6527>chant<s%> to the <S%H6310>sound<s%> of the <S%H5035>viol<s%>, and <S%H2803>invent<s%> to themselves <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>musick<s%>, like <S%H1732>David<s%>; chant: or, quaver

That <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in <S%H4219>bowls<s%>, and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> themselves with the <S%H7225>chief<s%> <S%H8081>ointments<s%>: but they are not <S%H2470>grieved<s%> for the <S%H7667>affliction<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>. wine: or, in bowls of wine affliction: Heb. breach

Therefore now shall they go <S%H1540>captive<s%> with the <S%H7218>first<s%> that go <S%H1540>captive<s%>, and the <S%H4797>banquet<s%> of them that <S%H5628>stretched<s%> themselves shall be <S%H5493>removed<s%>.

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by <S%H5315>himself<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, I <S%H8374>abhor<s%> the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H8130>hate<s%> his <S%H759>palaces<s%>: therefore will I deliver <S%H5462>up<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with all that is <S%H4393>therein<s%>. that: Heb. the fulness thereof
And it shall come to pass, if there <S%H3498>remain<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, that they shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.

And a man's <S%H1730>uncle<s%> shall take him <S%H5375>up<s%>, and he that <S%H5635>burneth<s%> him, to bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto him that is by the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, Is there yet any with thee? and he shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H657>No<s%>. Then shall he <S%H559>say<s%>, Hold thy <S%H2013>tongue<s%>: for we may not make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. we: or, they will not, or, have not

For, behold, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commandeth<s%>, and he will <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H7447>breaches<s%>, and the <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H1233>clefts<s%>. breaches: or, droppings

Shall <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H7323>run<s%> upon the <S%H5553>rock<s%>? will one <S%H2790>plow<s%> there with <S%H1241>oxen<s%>? for ye have <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> into <S%H7219>gall<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> into <S%H3939>hemlock<s%>:
Ye which <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> in a <S%H1697>thing<s%> of <S%H3808>nought<s%>, which <S%H559>say<s%>, Have we not <S%H3947>taken<s%> to us <S%H7161>horns<s%> by our own <S%H2392>strength<s%>?

But, behold, I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> against you a <S%H1471>nation<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; and they shall <S%H3905>afflict<s%> you from the entering <S%H935>in<s%> of <S%H2574>Hemath<s%> unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> of the <S%H6160>wilderness<s%>. river: or, valley
